title._content: [Portrait of Jose Mangual, Glen Island Casino, New York, N.Y., ca. July 1947] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Jose Mangual, Glen Island Casino, New York, N.Y., ca. July 1947] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 222 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Mangual, Jose Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Latin jazz--1940-1950. Percussionists--1940-1950. Glen Island Casino Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950.
